biotools.summary: An R package to detect selection in biological pathways. Using gene selection scores and biological pathways data, one can search for high-scoring subnetworks of genes within pathways and test their significance.

bioschemas.name: signet
bioschemas.summary: An R package to detect selection in biological pathways. Using gene selection scores and biological pathways data, one can search for high-scoring subnetworks of genes within pathways and test their significance.
